column1: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week. -George S. Patton
Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay. -Simone de Beauvoir.
Decide what you want. Decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work. -H. L. Hunt
Either I will find a way, or I will make one. -Philip Sidney
Failiure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough. -Og Mandino
If you can dream it, you can do it. -Walt Disney
If you fell down yesterday, stand up today. -H.G. Wells
If you're going through hell, keep going. -Winston Churchill
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can. -Nikos Kazantzakis
It always seems impossible until it's done. -Nelson Mandela
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. -Charles R. Swindoll
Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me. -Carol Burnett
Opportunity doesn't knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door. -Kyle Chandler
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th. -Julie Andrews
Quality is not an act, it is a habit. -Aristotle
Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there. -Bo Jackson
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. -Arthur Ashe
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step  -Lao Tzu
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. -Mark Twain
There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self. -Aldous Huxley
Well done is better than well said. -Benjamin Franklin
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor. -Elon Musk
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts. -Eleanor Roosevelt
You just can't beat the person who never gives up. -Babe Ruth
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground. -Theodore Roosevelt
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail. -Benjamin Franklin
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. -Confucius
Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose? -Eliza Dushku
If you think you can do it, you can. -John Burroughs
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one. -Wayne Dyer
A will finds a way. -Orison Swett Marden
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible. -Tony Robbins
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. -Les Brown
Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhiliration of victory. -George S. Patton
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later. -Og Mandino
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for al ife that is less than the one you are capable of living. -Nelson Mandela
The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future. -Philip Emeagwali
Motivation will almost always beat mere talent. -Norman Ralph Augustine
The most effective way to do it, is to do it. -Amelia Earhart.
There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move! -Edgar Cayce
When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder. -Natalie Gulbis
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals. -Zig Ziglar
Step by step and the thing is done. -Charles Atlas
Things do not happen. Things are made to happen. -John F. Kennedy
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others. -Ayn Rand
Always desire to learn something useful. -Sophocles
You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine. -Flip Wilson
Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God. -Leo Buscaglia
You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water. -Rabindranath Tagore
The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best. -Epictetus
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned. -Peter Marshal
Deserve your dream. -Octavio Paz
We make the world we live in and shape our own environment. -Orison Swett Marden
Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you. -Thomas Jefferson
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking. -William Butler Yeats
